channel.title: Client Jar Signing Problem
channel.description:
Hello as some of you may have read I posted a previous thread:
Hi everyone as some of you may know I am running on Mac OSX and I can't run .bat files on it (unless I install windows on it which I really don't want to do) and I thought it would be hopeless playing servers because NO client would run on my G5. But then I found an OS Universal (Operating System Universal) version of Moparscape for my Mac. And I picked up on that I can run .jar files on my Mac which is great news. And the OS Universal version of Mopar runs great on my mac. The one thing is. The new server I play (Jbirdscape) has different item ID's than Moparscape. So can someone either make Jbirdscape's client OS Universal or someone teach me how to? Thanks, really appreciate it -0wnz
Anyways I am trying to make a Jar file because of this reason and I got all the way to the part where you have to sign it. I got all the way through and I know that I did everything right because I referred to [url=http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-making-a-webclient-448998/]http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-making-a-webclient-448998/[/url] and for other people it worked. But when I try to sign the jar it says [code]Unable to sign JAR File. Caused By:[/code] And it doesn't even show me the problem. So can someone either tell me what the problem is or teach me how to make a client OS Universal? Thanks

item.title: Client Jar Signing Problem
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

Hello as some of you may have read I posted a previous thread:

Hi everyone as some of you may know I am running on Mac OSX and I can't run .bat files on it (unless I install windows on it which I really don't want to do) and I thought it would be hopeless playing servers because NO client would run on my G5. But then I found an OS Universal (Operating System Universal) version of Moparscape for my Mac. And I picked up on that I can run .jar files on my Mac which is great news. And the OS Universal version of Mopar runs great on my mac. The one thing is. The new server I play (Jbirdscape) has different item ID's than Moparscape. So can someone either make Jbirdscape's client OS Universal or someone teach me how to? Thanks, really appreciate it

-0wnz

Anyways I am trying to make a Jar file because of this reason and I got all the way to the part where you have to sign it. I got all the way through and I know that I did everything right because I referred to http://forum.ragezone.com/f365/tut-making-a-webclient-448998/ and for other people it worked. But when I try to sign the jar it says

Unable to sign JAR File. Caused By:

And it doesnâ€™t even show me the problem. So can someone either tell me what the problem is or teach me how to make a client OS Universal? Thanks
